statements: UPDATE UserBehavior SET event_type='click' WHERE user_id=100

UPDATE UserBehavior SET action='clicked', timestamp='2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE user_id=101;

UPDATE UserBehavior SET action='login', location='homepage' WHERE user_id=1;

UPDATE user_behavior SET behavior_type='click', timestamp='2022-05-25 10:30:00' WHERE user_id=1001;
UPDATE page_views SET timestamp='2022-05-25 09:45:00', page_url='/home' WHERE user_id=2002;
UPDATE user_behavior SET behavior_type = 'log out' WHERE user_id = 12345
UPDATE user_analytics SET total_sessions = total_sessions + 1, avg_session_duration = 25.75 WHERE user_id = 54321
UPDATE users_table SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE actions_table SET action_time='2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE action_id=3;
UPDATE users_table SET email='newemail@example.com', username='newusername' WHERE user_id=1;

UPDATE user_accounts SET email = 'updated_email@example.com' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_devices SET device_model = 'New Model', last_used = '2023-12-31 23:59:59' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_preferences SET preference_value = 'dark_mode' WHERE user_id = 101 AND preference_name = 'theme';
UPDATE user_devices SET device_type = 'Mobile', device_model = 'iPhone X', last_used = '2022-05-15 08:30:00' WHERE user_id = 102;
